p: RNA sequencing FASTQ files were processed with STAR aligner [ 89]. We used ‘GeneCounts’ mode with the Ensembl human transcriptome annotation (Build version GRCh38 and transcript annotation GRCh38.89). Complete HGNC dataset [ 90], version of July 13, 2017, was used to convert Ensembl gene IDs to HGNC gene symbols.
